author: mriou
msg: Hurra, hello world works! On the minus side the runtime Javascript expression evaluation is very primitive, only a handful of activities are supported and there are TODOs all over the place. But it's a nice first step.

author: senaka
msg: The port of a url is defined only if there is a host
